text: ninre janataye iruttukalil ninn veliccattilekk keant varikayum, allahuvinre (anugrahattinre) nalukalepparri avare ormippikkukayum ceyyuka enn nirdesiccukeant musaye nam'mute drstantannalumayi nam ayakkukayuntayi. tikanna ksamasilamullavarum ere nandiyullavarumaya ellavarkkum atil drstantannaluntâ€Œ. tircca
